definition: father and elder brother(s)/head of the family/patriarch

sentences.english: Men, brethren, and fathers, hear ye my defence which I make now unto you.
sentences.chinese: 诸位父兄请听，我现在对你们分诉。

sentences.english: One day, Hugo heard that her father and brothers were away.
sentences.chinese: 一天，雨果听说她的父兄几人都出门往了。

sentences.english: Brothers and fathers, listen now to my defense.
sentences.chinese: 诸位父兄请听，我现在对你们分诉。

sentences.english: I pristine father and brother, always ineloquent.
sentences.chinese: 我质朴的父兄，向来不善言辞。

sentences.english: Slumber not in the tents of your fathers.
sentences.chinese: 不要在你父兄的帐篷里沉睡。

sentences.english: Kennedy enrolled in Harvard, as had his father and brothers.
sentences.chinese: 毕业后，他如父兄一样入学哈佛。

sentences.english: Do not you Fuxiong in the tent sleeping, the times are moving.
sentences.chinese: 不要在你父兄的帐篷里沉睡，时代在前进。

definition: relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
imperial clan/member of the imperial clan/clansman/ancestral shrine
crown prince/heir of a noble house
